column4: hi everybody, can anyone show me a tried howto about installing nvidia geforce ddr 256 driver at ubuntu???
just follow any of the howto's on the subject, but make sure you do not get the latest driver, you need the last non-7xxx series driver for the Geforce 256
why not non-7xxx, I tried  7667...
because nvidia no longer support anything older than the geforce 4
thanks, i will try 6111 :)
you there?
sort of
i'm wading thru building a LFS system
can i ask you a small thing?
what is it?
i tried NVIDIA-6111 but i get an error message like:
The rivafb driver conflicts with the NVIDIA driver; the NVIDIA kernel module will still be built and installed,
that's just a warning
do u have any idea how to fix it?
unless you actually have the rivafb loaded, in which case, don't use the framebuffer :P
yea but i cannot log on to X because of that warning :)
its more likely you can't log on to X because you haven't configured X properly yet :)
might be true :)

ERROR: Unable to load the kernel module 'nvidia.ko'.  This is most likely because the kernel module was built using the wrong kernel source files. Please make sure you have installed the kernel source files for your kernel;
this was the error message i got
